parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Strings

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Copies ANSI text string to the clipboard. If Unicode support is desired, see [[forceUnicode]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''copyToClipboard''' text

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[copyToClipboard]] [[str]] _data;</code>

</value></part><part><name>mp </name>=<value> <template><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>In Multiplayer restricted to the client that '''[[isServer|is server]]'''</value></part></template> 

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[copyFromClipboard]], [[diag_log]], [[forceUnicode]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 12, 2014 - 02:38 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Benargee|Benargee]]</dt>
<dd class="note">To add a line break in output text do this:
<code>_br <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[toString]] [13,10];//(carriage return & line feed)
_string <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> "Line 1" + _br + "Line 2";
[[copyToClipboard]] _string;
</code>
Paste into text editor of choice, you get:
<code>Line 1
Line 2</code>
(A3 1.30 Stable executed inside .sqf via [[execVM]])
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
